item.title: The Return Gift
item.description: “I will buy you the toy car on your birthday, Varun,” yelled Mumma. “But,” Varun tried to reason with her. “What has Mumma told you to do when she is working?” Mumma bristled with rage while continuously typing a mail to her colleague. “Do - not - disturb,” Varun replied to the floor and walked away while folding his hands as if he’s trying to contain his anger. During the dinner, there was an awkward silence.

item.title: Tutorial on Installation of OpenFOAM, preCICE, OpenFOAM-Adapter, and MBDyn
item.description: IMP: UPDATED CASE AND ADAPTER SETTINGS AVAILABLE AT – https://github.com/rudhkul/fsicavity. Firstly, install OpenFOAM 5 and Paraview (as the PRECICE adapter currenlty supports this latest version) by using the following commands: sudo sh -c "wget -O - http://dl.openfoam.org/gpg.key | apt-key add -" sudo add-apt-repository http://dl.openfoam.org/ubuntu sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get -y install openfoam5 After the installation is over, add . /opt/openfoam5/etc/bashrc to your ~/.bashrc file. Once, the OpenFOAM software has been installed and the library has been included, the OpenFOAM-Adapter with FSI capabilities should be built.

Dhinakaran. “Effects of Prandtl number on the forced convection heat transfer from a porous square cylinder.
